author: Marcello D’Andrea
description: Marcello’s inspiration: “Doña Lucia is a cocktail inspired by Doña Lucia Victoria Moreau, wife of Facundo Bacardí. It represents how, with the support of your loved ones, you can make your dreams come true.”
name: Doña Lucia
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'simple' (1 sugar to 1 water, 48°Brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
